name: C. DZY Loves Sequences
statement:
DZY has a sequence , consisting of integers.We’ll call a sequence a
subsegment of the sequence . The value denotes the length of the
subsegment.Your task is to find the longest subsegment of , such that it
is possible to change at most one number (change one number to any
integer you want) from the subsegment to make the subsegment strictly
increasing.You only need to output the length of the subsegment you
find.
